name: Asteroid Field Sweeper
description:
Submission for the: My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

You are a convict in a space mining vessel sentenced to gather minerals from a nearby asteroid field. As you progress explosive mines appear to thwart your efforts. 

Controls:

Forwards/Backwards: W/S

Strafe Left/Right: A/D

Strafe Up/Down: Up/Left Ctrl

Roll Left/Right: Q/E

Thrust: Left Shift (hold)

Fire Laser: Space (hold)

Pause: Escape

Assets:

Models, Font, & SFX: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-kit

Music: "Hyperspace" by vitalezzz https://opengameart.org/content/hyperspace

UI: https://wenrexa.itch.io/wenrexa-game-assets-2

Unfinished features: 

Landing Sequence in Hangar Module for easier level transition (scrapped last minute)

SFX for mines and player laser/thrusters

original planned feature: 

enemy AI ships that would patrol and shoot at the player.
